mapper.select: SELECT t.ID id, t.TABLE_ID tableId, t.TABLE_NAME tableName, t.TITLE title FROM t_home_search t WHERE t.TITLE like concat(concat('%',#{title}),'%')

SELECT t.ID id, t.NOTICE_TITLE title, t.NOTICE_DETAILS details, t.PICTURE_PATH picturePath, t.CREATE_USER_ID createUserId, t.CREATE_DATA createDate, t.UPDATE_USER_ID updateUserId, t.UPDATE_DATA updateDate FROM t_home_notice t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG='1' AND t.ID=#{id}
